GSD.description:
dmaengine: ti: k3-udma: Reset UDMA_CHAN_RT byte counters to prevent overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit a065657643a62a24b4435ddcaea45f1e9378749e. For more details please see the references link.
